description: Creates a snapshot copy grant that permits Amazon Redshift to use an encrypted symmetric key from Key Management Service (KMS) to encrypt copied snapshots in a destination region. For more information about managing snapshot copy grants, go to Amazon Redshift Database Encryption in the Amazon Redshift Cluster Management Guide.

parameters.name: SnapshotCopyGrantName
parameters.description: The name of the snapshot copy grant. This name must be unique in the region for the Amazon Web Services account. Constraints: Must contain from 1 to 63 alphanumeric characters or hyphens. Alphabetic characters must be lowercase. First character must be a letter. Cannot end with a hyphen or contain two consecutive hyphens. Must be unique for all clusters within an Amazon Web Services account.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: A list of tag instances. (dict) --- A tag consisting of a name/value pair for a resource. Key (string) --- The key, or name, for the resource tag. Value (string) --- The value for the resource tag.

nested_params.description: The key, or name, for the resource tag.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The value for the resource tag.

nested_items.name: SnapshotCopyGrant
